entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
